name: Bulbasaur
description: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.

name: Ivysaur
description: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower's coming bloom.

name: Venusaur
description: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokémon.

name: Charmander
description: The fire on the tip of its tail is a measure of its life. If healthy, its tail burns intensely.

name: Charmeleon
description: In the rocky mountains where Charmeleon live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.

name: Charizard
description: It is said that Charizard's fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.

name: Squirtle
description: It shelters itself in its shell, then strikes back with spouts of water at every opportunity.

name: Wartortle
description: It is said to live 10,000 years. Its furry tail is popular as a symbol of longevity.

name: Blastoise
description: The jets of water it spouts from the rocket cannons on its shell can punch through thick steel.

name: Caterpie
description: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.

name: Metapod
description: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.

name: Butterfree
description: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.

name: Weedle
description: It eats its weight in leaves every day. It fends off attackers with the needle on its head.

name: Kakuna
description: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.

name: Beedrill
description: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.

name: Pidgey
description: It is docile and prefers to avoid conflict. If disturbed, however, it can ferociously strike back.

name: Pidgeotto
description: It flies over its wide territory in search of prey, downing it with its highly developed claws.

name: Pidgeot
description: By flapping its wings with all its might, Pidgeot can make a gust of wind capable of bending tall trees.

name: Rattata
description: Cautious in the extreme, its hardy vitality lets it live in any kind of environment.

name: Raticate
description: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.

name: Spearow
description: It flaps its small wings busily to fly. Using its beak, it searches in grass for prey.

name: Fearow
description: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.

name: Ekans
description: It sneaks through grass without making a sound and strikes unsuspecting prey from behind.

name: Arbok
description: The pattern on its belly is for intimidation. It constricts foes while they are frozen in fear.

name: Pikachu
description: It occasionally uses an electric shock to recharge a fellow Pikachu that is in a weakened state.

name: Raichu
description: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.

name: Sandshrew
description: To protect itself from attackers, it curls up into a ball. It lives in arid regions with minimal rainfall.

name: Sandslash
description: It curls up, then rolls into foes with its back. Its sharp spines inflict severe damage.

name: Nidoran ♀
description: While it does not prefer to fight, even one drop of the poison it secretes from barbs can be fatal.

name: Nidorina
description: When it senses danger, it raises all the barbs on its body. These barbs grow slower than Nidorino's.

name: Nidoqueen
description: Its entire body is armored with hard scales. It will protect the young in its burrow with its life.

name: Nidoran ♂
description: It scans its surroundings by raising its ears out of the grass. Its toxic horn is for protection.

name: Nidorino
description: It has a violent disposition and stabs foes with its horn, which oozes poison upon impact.

name: Nidoking
description: One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.

name: Clefairy
description: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.

name: Clefable
description: It is very wary and rarely shows itself to people. Its ears can hear a pin drop over half a mile away.

name: Vulpix
description: It controls balls of fire. As it grows, its six tails split from their tips to make more tails.

name: Ninetales
description: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. It can live for a thousand years.

name: Jigglypuff
description: When it wavers its big, round eyes, it begins singing a lullaby that makes everyone drowsy.

name: Wigglytuff
description: Its fine fur feels sublime to the touch. It can expand its body by inhaling air.

name: Zubat
description: It checks its surroundings and location using reflections of the ultrasonic waves from its mouth.

name: Golbat
description: Its sharp fangs puncture the toughest of hides and have small holes for greedily sucking blood.

name: Oddish
description: It often plants its root feet in the ground during the day and sows seeds as it walks about at night.

name: Gloom
description: The honey it drools from its mouth smells so atrocious, it can curl noses more than a mile away.

name: Vileplume
description: Its petals are the largest in the world. As it walks, it scatters extremely allergenic pollen.

name: Paras
description: Mushrooms named tochukaso grow on its back. They grow along with the host Paras.

name: Parasect
description: A mushroom grown larger than the host's body controls Parasect. It scatters poisonous spores.

name: Venonat
description: Its big eyes are actually clusters of tiny eyes. At night, its kind is drawn by light.

name: Venomoth
description: It flutters its wings to scatter dustlike scales. The scales leach toxins if they contact skin.

name: Diglett
description: A Pokémon that lives underground. Because of its dark habitat, it is repelled by bright sunlight.

name: Dugtrio
description: Its three heads move alternately, driving it through tough soil to depths of over 60 miles.

name: Meowth
description: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.

name: Persian
description: A very haughty Pokémon. Among fans, the size of the jewel in its forehead is a topic of much talk.

name: Psyduck
description: Overwhelmed by enigmatic abilities, it suffers a constant headache. It sometimes uses mysterious powers.

name: Golduck
description: It is seen swimming dynamically and elegantly using its well-developed limbs and flippers.

name: Mankey
description: It lives in treetop colonies. If one becomes enraged, the whole colony rampages for no reason.

name: Primeape
description: It grows angry if you see its eyes and gets angrier if you run. If you beat it, it gets even madder.

name: Growlithe
description: A Pokémon with a loyal nature. It will remain motionless until it is given an order by its Trainer.

name: Arcanine
description: Its proud and regal appearance has captured the hearts of people since long ago.

name: Poliwag
description: Its skin is so thin, its internal organs are visible. It has trouble walking on its newly grown feet.

name: Poliwhirl
description: The spiral pattern on its belly subtly undulates. Staring at it gradually causes drowsiness.

name: Poliwrath
description: With its extremely tough muscles, it can keep swimming in the Pacific Ocean without resting.

name: Abra
description: Using its psychic power is such a strain on its brain that it needs to sleep for 18 hours a day.

name: Kadabra
description: It stares at its silver spoon to focus its mind. It emits more alpha waves while doing so.

name: Alakazam
description: The spoons clutched in its hands are said to have been created by its psychic powers.

name: Machop
description: Though small in stature, it is powerful enough to easily heft and throw a number of Geodude at once.

name: Machoke
description: It happily carries heavy cargo to toughen up. It willingly does hard work for people.

name: Machamp
description: Its four muscled arms slam foes with powerful punches and chops at blinding speed.

name: Bellsprout
description: It prefers hot and humid environments. It is quick at capturing prey with its vines.

name: Weepinbell
description: A Pokémon that appears to be a plant. It captures unwary prey by dousing them with a toxic powder.

name: Victreebel
description: It pools in its mouth a fluid with a honeylike scent, which is really an acid that dissolves anything.

name: Tentacool
description: Because its body is almost entirely composed of water, it shrivels up if it is washed ashore.

name: Tentacruel
description: It extends its 80 tentacles to form an encircling poisonous net that is difficult to escape.

name: Geodude
description: At rest, it looks just like a rock. Carelessly stepping on it will make it swing its fists angrily.

name: Graveler
description: It rolls on mountain paths to move. Once it builds momentum, no Pokémon can stop it without difficulty.

name: Golem
description: Even dynamite can't harm its hard, boulderlike body. It sheds its hide just once a year.

name: Ponyta
description: As a newborn, it can barely stand. However, through galloping, its legs are made tougher and faster.

name: Rapidash
description: When at an all-out gallop, its blazing mane sparkles, enhancing its beautiful appearance.

name: Slowpoke
description: Although slow, it is skilled at fishing with its tail. It does not feel pain if its tail is bitten.

name: Slowbro
description: Though usually dim witted, it seems to become inspired if the Shellder on its tail bites down.

name: Magnemite
description: The faster the units at its sides rotate, the greater the magnetic force they generate.

name: Magneton
description: Many mysteriously appear when more sunspots dot the sun. They stop TV sets from displaying properly.

name: Farfetch'd
description: It can't live without the stalk it holds. That's why it defends the stalk from attackers with its life.

name: Doduo
description: The brains in its two heads appear to communicate emotions to each other with a telepathic power.

name: Dodrio
description: When Doduo evolves into this odd breed, one of its heads splits into two. It runs at nearly 40 mph.

name: Seel
description: A Pokémon that lives on icebergs. It swims in the sea using the point on its head to break up ice.

name: Dewgong
description: In snow, the pure white coat covering its body obscures it from predators.

name: Grimer
description: It was born when sludge in a dirty stream was exposed to the moon's X-rays. It appears among filth.

name: Muk
description: A toxic fluid seeps from its body. The fluid instantly kills plants and trees on contact.

name: Shellder
description: It swims backward by opening and closing its two shells. Its large tongue is always kept hanging out.

name: Cloyster
description: It fights by keeping its shell tightly shut for protection and by shooting spikes to repel foes.

name: Gastly
description: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.

name: Haunter
description: It likes to lurk in the dark and tap shoulders with a gaseous hand. Its touch causes endless shuddering.

name: Gengar
description: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a Gengar delighting in casting curses on people.

name: Onix
description: It burrows through the ground at a speed of 50 mph while feeding on large boulders.

name: Drowzee
description: It can tell what people are dreaming by sniffing with its big nose. It loves fun dreams.

name: Hypno
description: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.

name: Krabby
description: It lives in burrows dug on sandy beaches. Its pincers fully grow back if they are broken in battle.

name: Kingler
description: The larger pincer has 10,000- horsepower strength. However, it is so heavy, it is difficult to aim.

name: Voltorb
description: It looks just like a Poké Ball. It is dangerous because it may electrocute or explode on touch.

name: Electrode
description: It is known to drift on winds if it is bloated to bursting with stored electricity.

name: Exeggcute
description: Its six eggs converse using telepathy. They can quickly gather if they become separated.

name: Exeggutor
description: It is called “The Walking Jungle." If a head grows too big, it falls off and becomes an Exeggcute.

name: Cubone
description: When it thinks of its dead mother, it cries. Its crying makes the skull it wears rattle hollowly.

name: Marowak
description: From its birth, this savage Pokémon constantly holds bones. It is skilled in using them as weapons.

name: Hitmonlee
description: Its legs can stretch double. First-time foes are startled by its extensible reach.

name: Hitmonchan
description: The arm-twisting punches it throws pulverize even concrete. It rests after three minutes of fighting.

name: Lickitung
description: When it extends its over-six-foot- long tongue, its tail quivers. There is a possibility they are connected.

name: Koffing
description: Lighter-than-air gases in its body keep it aloft. The gases not only smell, they are also explosive.

name: Weezing
description: It grows by feeding on gases released by garbage. Though very rare, triplets have been found.

name: Rhyhorn
description: Its powerful tackles can destroy anything. However, it is too slow witted to help people work.

name: Rhydon
description: Standing on its hind legs freed its forelegs and made it smarter. It is very forgetful, however.

name: Chansey
description: A kindly Pokémon that lays highly nutritious eggs and shares them with injured Pokémon or people.

name: Tangela
description: The blue vines shrouding its body are covered in a growth of fine hair. It is known to be ticklish.

name: Kangaskhan
description: It raises its offspring in its belly pouch. It lets the baby out to play only when it feels safe.

name: Horsea
description: It makes its nest in the shade of corals. If it senses danger, it spits murky ink and flees.

name: Seadra
description: Its spines provide protection. Its fins and bones are prized as traditional medicine ingredients.

name: Goldeen
description: Though it appears very elegant when swimming with fins unfurled, it can jab powerfully with its horn.

name: Seaking
description: In autumn, its body becomes more fatty in preparing to propose to a mate. It takes on beautiful colors.

name: Staryu
description: If its body is torn, it can grow back if the red core remains. The core flashes at midnight.

name: Starmie
description: At the center of its body is a red core, which sends mysterious radio signals into the night sky.

name: Mr. Mime
description: It shapes an invisible wall in midair by minutely vibrating its fingertips to stop molecules in the air.

name: Scyther
description: The sharp scythes on its forearms become increasingly sharp by cutting through hard objects.

name: Jynx
description: Its cries sound like human speech. However, it is impossible to tell what it is trying to say.

name: Electabuzz
description: It windmills its arms to slightly boost its punches. Foes have been known to escape in the meantime.

name: Magmar
description: When it breathes deeply, heat waves form around its body, making it hard to see clearly.

name: Pinsir
description: It grips prey with its pincers until the prey is torn in half. What it can't tear, it tosses far.

name: Tauros
description: Once it takes aim at its foe, it makes a headlong charge. It is famous for its violent nature.

name: Magikarp
description: A Magikarp living for many years can leap a mountain using Splash. The move remains useless, though.

name: Gyarados
description: Once it begins to rampage, a Gyarados will burn everything down, even in a harsh storm.

name: Lapras
description: It loves crossing the sea with people and Pokémon on its back. It understands human speech.

name: Ditto
description: It has the ability to reconstitute its entire cellular structure to transform into whatever it sees.

name: Eevee
description: Because its genetic makeup is irregular, it quickly changes its form due to a variety of causes.

name: Vaporeon
description: Its cell composition is similar to water molecules. As a result, it can melt away into water.

name: Jolteon
description: If agitated, it uses electricity to straighten out its fur and launch it in small bunches.

name: Flareon
description: Inhaled air is heated in the flame sac in its body to an intense fire over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Porygon
description: A man-made Pokémon created using advanced scientific means. It can move freely in cyberspace.

name: Omanyte
description: A Pokémon that was resurrected from a fossil using modern science. It swam in ancient seas.

name: Omastar
description: It is thought that this Pokémon became extinct because its spiral shell grew too large.

name: Kabuto
description: It is thought to have inhabited beaches 300 million years ago. It is protected by a stiff shell.

name: Kabutops
description: It is thought that this Pokémon came onto land because its prey adapted to life on land.

name: Aerodactyl
description: A Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.

name: Snorlax
description: When its belly is full, it becomes too lethargic to even lift a finger, so it is safe to bounce on its belly.

name: Articuno
description: A legendary bird Pokémon. It can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.

name: Zapdos
description: A legendary Pokémon that is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.

name: Moltres
description: One of the legendary bird Pokémon. It is said that its appearance indicates the coming of spring.

name: Dratini
description: It is called the “Mirage Pokémon" because so few have seen it. Its shed skin has been found.

name: Dragonair
description: If its body takes on an aura, the weather changes instantly. It is said to live in seas and lakes.

name: Dragonite
description: It is said to make its home somewhere in the sea. It guides crews of shipwrecks to shore.

name: Mewtwo
description: A Pokémon created by recombining Mew's genes. It's said to have the most savage heart among Pokémon.

name: Mew
description: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe Mew to be the ancestor of Pokémon.

name: Chikorita
description: It uses the leaf on its head to determine the temperature and humidity. It loves to sunbathe.

name: Bayleef
description: The buds that ring its neck give off a spicy aroma that perks people up.

name: Meganium
description: Its breath has the fantastic ability to revive dead plants and flowers.

name: Cyndaquil
description: It has a timid nature. If it is startled, the flames on its back burn more vigorously.

name: Quilava
description: It intimidates foes with the heat of its flames. The fire burns more strongly when it readies to fight.

name: Typhlosion
description: It attacks using blasts of fire. It creates heat shimmers with intense fire to hide itself.

name: Totodile
description: It has the habit of biting anything with its developed jaws. Even its Trainer needs to be careful.

name: Croconaw
description: Once it bites down, it won't let go until it loses its fangs. New fangs quickly grow into place.

name: Feraligatr
description: It usually moves slowly, but it goes at blinding speed when it attacks and bites prey.

name: Sentret
description: It has a very nervous nature. It stands up high on its tail so it can scan wide areas.

name: Furret
description: The mother puts its offspring to sleep by curling up around them. It corners foes with speed.

name: Hoothoot
description: It marks time precisely. Some countries consider it to be a wise friend, versed in the world's ways.

name: Noctowl
description: Its eyes are specially developed to enable it to see clearly even in murky darkness and minimal light.

name: Ledyba
description: It is so timid, it can't move if it isn't with a swarm of others. It conveys its feelings with scent.

name: Ledian
description: It uses starlight as energy. When more stars appear at night, the patterns on its back grow larger.

name: Spinarak
description: It sets a trap by spinning a web with thin but strong silk. It waits motionlessly for prey to arrive.

name: Ariados
description: It attaches silk to its prey and sets it free. Later, it tracks the silk to the prey and its friends.

name: Crobat
description: The transformation of its legs into wings made it better at flying, but more clumsy at walking.

name: Chinchou
description: It discharges positive and negative electricity from its antenna tips to shock its foes.

name: Lanturn
description: Lanturn's light can shine up from great depths. It is nicknamed “The Deep-Sea Star."

name: Pichu
description: The electric sacs in its cheeks are small. If even a little electricity leaks, it becomes shocked.

name: Cleffa
description: It is often seen when shooting stars fill the night skies. It's said to arrive riding on a shooting star.

name: Igglybuff
description: It has a soft and bouncy body. Once it starts bouncing, it becomes impossible to stop.

name: Togepi
description: It transforms the kindness and joy of others into happiness, which it stores in its shell.

name: Togetic
description: To share its happiness, it flies around the world seeking kind- hearted people.

name: Natu
description: It picks food from cactus plants, deftly avoiding buds and spines. It seems to skip about to move.

name: Xatu
description: This odd Pokémon can see both the past and the future. It eyes the sun's movement all day.

name: Mareep
description: Its fluffy coat swells to double when static electricity builds up. Touching it can be shocking.

name: Flaaffy
description: If its coat becomes fully charged with electricity, its tail lights up. It fires hair that zaps on impact.

name: Ampharos
description: The tip of its tail shines brightly. In the olden days, people sent signals using the tail's light.

name: Bellossom
description: When the heavy rainfall season ends, it is drawn out by warm sunlight to dance in the open.

name: Marill
description: The oil-filled end of its tail floats on water. It keeps Marill from drowning even in a strong current.

name: Azumarill
description: It can spend all day in water, since it can inhale and store a large volume of air.

name: Sudowoodo
description: To avoid being attacked, it does nothing but mimic a tree. It hates water and flees from rain.

name: Politoed
description: It gathers groups of others as their leader. Its cries make Poliwag obey.

name: Hoppip
description: It drifts on winds. It is said that when Hoppip gather in fields and mountains, spring is on the way.

name: Skiploom
description: It blooms when the weather warms. It floats in the sky to soak up as much sunlight as possible.

name: Jumpluff
description: Blown by seasonal winds, it circles the globe, scattering cotton spores as it goes.

name: Aipom
description: It lives high among the treetops. It can use its tail as freely and cleverly as its hands.

name: Sunkern
description: It suddenly falls out of the sky in the morning. A year after a cold summer, their population explodes.

name: Sunflora
description: It gets energy from warm sunlight and is known for its habit of moving in pursuit of it.

name: Yanma
description: It can hover in one spot by flapping its wings at high speed. It flits about to guard its territory.

name: Wooper
description: When walking on land, it covers its body with a poisonous film that keeps its skin from dehydrating.

name: Quagsire
description: It has an easygoing nature. It doesn't care if it bumps its head on boats and boulders while swimming.

name: Espeon
description: Its fur is so sensitive, it can sense minute shifts in the air and predict the weather.

name: Umbreon
description: When exposed to the moon's aura, the rings on its body glow faintly and it gains a mysterious power.

name: Murkrow
description: If spotted, it will lure an unwary person into chasing it, then lose the pursuer on mountain trails.

name: Slowking
description: Being bitten by Shellder gave it intelligence comparable to that of award-winning scientists.

name: Misdreavus
description: A Pokémon that startles people in the middle of the night. It gathers fear as its energy.

name: Unown
description: When alone, nothing happens. However, if there are two or more, an odd power is said to emerge.

name: Wobbuffet
description: It desperately tries to keep its black tail hidden. It is said to be proof the tail hides a secret.

name: Girafarig
description: The head on its tail contains a small brain. It can instinctively fight even while facing backward.

name: Pineco
description: It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell protects it from bird Pokémon that peck it by mistake.

name: Forretress
description: It is encased in a steel shell. Its peering eyes are all that can be seen of its mysterious innards.

name: Dunsparce
description: It digs into the ground with its tail and makes a mazelike nest. It can fly just a little.

name: Gligar
description: It glides as if sliding. It startles foes by clamping on to their faces, then jabs with its poison stinger.

name: Steelix
description: It is thought its body transformed as a result of iron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.

name: Snubbull
description: Small Pokémon flee from its scary face. It is, however, considered by women to be cute.

name: Granbull
description: It is timid in spite of its looks. If it becomes enraged, however, it will strike with its huge fangs.

name: Qwilfish
description: It shoots the poison spines on its body in all directions. Its round form makes it a poor swimmer.

name: Scizor
description: It raises its pincers with eyelike markings for intimidation. It also swings them down dangerously.

name: Shuckle
description: It stores berries in its shell. The berries eventually ferment to become delicious juices.

name: Heracross
description: It loves sweet honey. To keep all the honey to itself, it hurls rivals away with its prized horn.

name: Sneasel
description: A smart and sneaky Pokémon. A pair may work together to steal eggs by having one lure the parents away.

name: Teddiursa
description: It lets honey soak into its paws so it can lick them all the time. Every set of paws tastes unique.

name: Ursaring
description: In its territory, it leaves scratches on trees that bear delicious berries or fruits.

name: Slugma
description: Its body is made of magma. If it doesn't keep moving, its body will cool and harden.

name: Magcargo
description: Its body temperature is roughly 18,000 degrees F. Flames spout from gaps in its hardened shell.

name: Swinub
description: It has a very sensitive nose. It can locate mushrooms, berries, and even hot springs buried under ice.

name: Piloswine
description: Covered by a shaggy coat, it is strong against the cold. Its tusks of ice thicken when it snows.

name: Corsola
description: Many live in the clean seas of the south. They apparently can't live in polluted waters.

name: Remoraid
description: It forcefully squirts water. The water jet never misses prey even if the Remoraid is deep in the sea.

name: Octillery
description: It loves to lurk inside holes in rocks. It sometimes sprays ink on prey by sticking out only its mouth.

name: Delibird
description: It carries food rolled up in its tail. It has the habit of sharing food with people lost in mountains.

name: Mantine
description: While elegantly swimming in the sea, it ignores Remoraid that cling to its fins seeking food scraps.

name: Skarmory
description: Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor, it flies at speeds over 180 mph.

name: Houndour
description: It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It uses a variety of cries for communicating with others.

name: Houndoom
description: The flames it breathes when angry contain toxins. If they cause a burn, it will hurt forever.

name: Kingdra
description: It lives in caves on the seafloor and creates giant whirlpools every time it moves.

name: Phanpy
description: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.

name: Donphan
description: It attacks by curling up, then rolling into its foe. It can blow apart a house in one hit.

name: Porygon2
description: It was upgraded to enable the exploration of other planets. However, it failed to measure up.

name: Stantler
description: Staring at its antlers creates an odd sensation as if one were being drawn into their centers.

name: Smeargle
description: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.

name: Tyrogue
description: It is famous for its eagerness to fight and always nurses injuries from challenging larger foes.

name: Hitmontop
description: It fights while spinning like a top. The centrifugal force boosts its destructive power by ten.

name: Smoochum
description: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.

name: Elekid
description: A weak electric current flows between its horns. Sticking a hand there shocks the unwary.

name: Magby
description: Its magma-like blood circulates throughout its body. Its body's heat can top 1,100 degrees F.

name: Miltank
description: It is said that kids who drink Miltank's milk grow up to become hearty, healthy adults.

name: Blissey
description: The eggs it lays are filled with happiness. Eating even one bite will bring a smile to anyone.

name: Raikou
description: It is said to have fallen with lightning. It can fire thunderbolts from the rain clouds on its back.

name: Entei
description: It is said that when it roars, a volcano erupts somewhere around the globe.

name: Suicune
description: It races around the world to purify fouled water. It dashes away with the north wind.

name: Larvitar
description: A Pokémon that eats soil. Once it has eaten a large mountain, it goes to sleep so it can grow.

name: Pupitar
description: Its body is as hard as bedrock. By venting pressurized gas, it can launch itself like a rocket.

name: Tyranitar
description: If it rampages, it knocks down mountains and buries rivers. Maps must be redrawn afterward.

name: Lugia
description: It sleeps in a deep-sea trench. If it flaps its wings, it is said to cause a 40-day storm.

name: Ho-oh
description: Its feathers are in seven colors. It is said that anyone seeing it is promised eternal happiness.

name: Celebi
description: It has the power to travel across time, but it is said to appear only in peaceful times.

name: Treecko
description: The soles of its feet are covered by countless tiny spikes, enabling it to walk on walls and ceilings.

name: Grovyle
description: It lives in dense jungles. While  closing in on its prey, it leaps from branch to branch.

name: Sceptile
description: The leaves that grow on its arms can slice down thick trees. It is without peer in jungle combat.

name: Torchic
description: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees F.

name: Combusken
description: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.

name: Blaziken
description: Flames spout from its wrists, enveloping its knuckles. Its punches scorch its foes.

name: Mudkip
description: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.

name: Marshtomp
description: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.

name: Swampert
description: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.

name: Poochyena
description: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.

name: Mightyena
description: It chases down prey in a pack. It will never disobey the commands of a skilled Trainer.

name: Zigzagoon
description: It walks in zigzag fashion. It is good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.

name: Linoone
description: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.

name: Wurmple
description: Often targeted by bird Pokémon, it desperately resists by releasing poison from its tail spikes.

name: Silcoon
description: It wraps silk around the branches of a tree. It drinks rainwater on its silk while awaiting evolution.

name: Beautifly
description: Despite its looks, it is aggressive. It jabs with its long, thin mouth if disturbed while collecting pollen.

name: Cascoon
description: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.

name: Dustox
description: Toxic powder is scattered with each flap. At night, it is known to strip leaves off trees lining boulevards.

name: Lotad
description: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to Pokémon that can't swim.

name: Lombre
description: It has a mischievous spirit. If it spots an angler, it will tug on the fishing line to interfere.

name: Ludicolo
description: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can't help breaking out into a dance.

name: Seedot
description: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other Pokémon.

name: Nuzleaf
description: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.

name: Shiftry
description: By flapping its leafy fan, it can whip up gusts of 100 ft/second that can level houses.

name: Taillow
description: It has a gutsy spirit that makes it bravely take on tough foes. It flies in search of warm climates.

name: Swellow
description: It circles the sky in search of prey. When it spots one, it dives steeply to catch the prey.

name: Wingull
description: It soars high in the sky, riding on updrafts like a glider. It carries food tucked in its bill.

name: Pelipper
description: It is a messenger of the skies, carrying small Pokémon and eggs to safety in its bill.

name: Ralts
description: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or Pokémon, its body warms up slightly.

name: Kirlia
description: If its Trainer becomes happy, it overflows with energy, dancing joyously while spinning about.

name: Gardevoir
description: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.

name: Surskit
description: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head.

name: Masquerain
description: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.

name: Shroomish
description: It spouts poison spores from the top of its head. These spores cause pain all over if inhaled.

name: Breloom
description: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.

name: Slakoth
description: It spends nearly all its time in a day sprawled out. Just seeing it makes one drowsy.

name: Vigoroth
description: Its heart beats at a tenfold tempo, so it cannot sit still for even a moment.

name: Slaking
description: The world's laziest Pokémon. When it is lounging, it is actually saving energy for striking back.

name: Nincada
description: It grows underground, sensing its surroundings using antennae instead of its virtually blind eyes.

name: Ninjask
description: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.

name: Shedinja
description: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one's spirit.

name: Whismur
description: Usually, its cries are like quiet murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks at the same volume as a jet plane.

name: Loudred
description: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.

name: Exploud
description: Its howls can be heard over six miles away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.

name: Makuhita
description: It toughens its body by slamming into thick trees. Many snapped trees can be found near its nest.

name: Hariyama
description: It loves to match power with big-bodied Pokémon. It can knock a truck flying with its arm thrusts.

name: Azurill
description: Its tail bounces like a rubber ball. It flings that tail around to fight opponents bigger than itself.

name: Nosepass
description: When endangered, it may protect itself by raising its magnetism and drawing iron objects to its body.

name: Skitty
description: It can't stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.

name: Delcatty
description: It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not keep a nest.

name: Sableye
description: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.

name: Mawile
description: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.

name: Aron
description: It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.

name: Lairon
description: For food, it digs up iron ore. It smashes its steely body against others to fight over territory.

name: Aggron
description: While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.

name: Meditite
description: It always trains deep in mountains. It levitates when it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.

name: Medicham
description: It gains the ability to see the aura of its opponents by honing its mind through starvation.

name: Electrike
description: Using electricity stored in its fur, it stimulates its muscles to heighten its reaction speed.

name: Manectric
description: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.

name: Plusle
description: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.

name: Minun
description: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.

name: Volbeat
description: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves Illumise's sweet aroma.

name: Illumise
description: With its sweet aroma, it guides Volbeat to draw signs with light in the night sky.

name: Roselia
description: The more healthy the Roselia, the more pleasant its flowers' aroma. Its scent deeply relaxes people.

name: Gulpin
description: Almost all its body is its stomach. Its harsh digestive juices quickly dissolve anything it swallows.

name: Swalot
description: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.

name: Carvanha
description: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.

name: Sharpedo
description: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as “The Bully of the Sea."

name: Wailmer
description: On sunny days, it lands on beaches to bounce like a ball and play. It spouts water from its nose.

name: Wailord
description: The biggest of all Pokémon. It can dive to a depth of almost 10,000 feet on only one breath.

name: Numel
description: Its humped back stores intensely hot magma. In rain, the magma cools, slowing its movement.

name: Camerupt
description: It has volcanoes on its back. If magma builds up in its body, it shudders, then erupts violently.

name: Torkoal
description: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.

name: Spoink
description: It bounces constantly, using its tail like a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.

name: Grumpig
description: It uses black pearls to amplify its psycho-power. It does an odd dance to gain control over foes.

name: Spinda
description: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.

name: Trapinch
description: It makes a conical pit in desert sand and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.

name: Vibrava
description: It violently shudders its wings, generating ultrasonic waves to induce headaches in people.

name: Flygon
description: It whips up sandstorms with powerful flaps of its wings. It is known as “The Desert Spirit."

name: Cacnea
description: By storing water in its body, this desert dweller can survive for 30 days without water.

name: Cacturne
description: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the day's desert heat.

name: Swablu
description: It can't relax if it or its surroundings are not clean. It wipes off dirt with its wings.

name: Altaria
description: If it bonds with a person, it will gently envelop the friend with its soft wings, then hum.

name: Zangoose
description: It has feuded with Seviper for many generations. Its sharp claws are its biggest weapons.

name: Seviper
description: For many generations, it has feuded with Zangoose. It whets its bladed tail on rocks for battle.

name: Lunatone
description: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.

name: Solrock
description: A new Pokémon species, rumored to be from the sun. It gives off light while spinning.

name: Barboach
description: Its slimy body is hard to grasp. In one region, it is said to have been born from hardened mud.

name: Whiscash
description: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.

name: Corphish
description: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.

name: Crawdaunt
description: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokémon from its pond.

name: Baltoy
description: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.

name: Claydol
description: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.

name: Lileep
description: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.

name: Cradily
description: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up prey from beaches.

name: Anorith
description: A Pokémon ancestor that was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with claws.

name: Armaldo
description: It went ashore after evolving. Its entire body is clad in a sturdy armor.

name: Feebas
description: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.

name: Milotic
description: Its lovely scales are described as rainbow colored. They change color depending on the viewing angle.

name: Castform
description: Its appearance changes with the weather. Recently, its molecules were found to be just like water.

name: Kecleon
description: It can freely change its body's color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn't change, however.

name: Shuppet
description: It loves vengeful emotions and hangs in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.

name: Banette
description: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.

name: Duskull
description: It loves the crying of children. It startles bad kids by passing through walls and making them cry.

name: Dusclops
description: It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.

name: Tropius
description: Delicious fruits grew out from around its neck because it always ate the same kind of fruit.

name: Chimecho
description: Its cries echo inside its hollow body to emerge as beautiful notes for startling and repelling foes.

name: Absol
description: Rumored to sense disasters with its horn, it became a target. It fled deep into the mountains.

name: Wynaut
description: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.

name: Snorunt
description: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.

name: Glalie
description: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.

name: Spheal
description: It rolls across ice floes to reach shore because its body is poorly shaped for swimming.

name: Sealeo
description: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.

name: Walrein
description: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.

name: Clamperl
description: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.

name: Huntail
description: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.

name: Gorebyss
description: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.

name: Relicanth
description: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.

name: Luvdisc
description: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.

name: Bagon
description: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.

name: Shelgon
description: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.

name: Salamence
description: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.

name: Beldum
description: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.

name: Metang
description: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its steel body won't be scratched if it collides with a jet.

name: Metagross
description: Metang combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.

name: Regirock
description: Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips off in battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.

name: Regice
description: Its body is made of ice from the ice age. It controls frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Registeel
description: Tempered by pressure underground over tens of thousands of years, its body cannot be scratched.

name: Latias
description: Its body is covered with a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.

name: Latios
description: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.

name: Kyogre
description: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.

name: Groudon
description: It had been asleep in underground magma ever since it fiercely fought Kyogre long ago.

name: Rayquaza
description: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.

name: Jirachi
description: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.

name: Deoxys
description: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.

name: Turtwig
description: The shell on its back is made of soil. On a very healthy Turtwig, the shell should feel moist.

name: Grotle
description: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.

name: Torterra
description: Some Pokémon are born on a Torterra's back and spend their entire life there.

name: Chimchar
description: It is very agile. Before going to sleep, it extinguishes the flame on its tail to prevent fires.

name: Monferno
description: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.

name: Infernape
description: It uses unique fighting moves with fire on its hands and feet. It will take on any opponent.

name: Piplup
description: A poor walker, it often falls down. However, its strong pride makes it puff up its chest without a care.

name: Prinplup
description: Because every Prinplup considers itself to be the most important, they can never form a group.

name: Empoleon
description: If anyone were to hurt its pride, it would slash them with wings that can cleave through an ice floe.

name: Starly
description: Because they are weak individually, they form groups. However, they bicker if the group grows too big.

name: Staravia
description: Recognizing their own weakness, they always live in a group. When alone, a Staravia cries noisily.

name: Staraptor
description: It never stops attacking even if it is injured. It fusses over the shape of its comb.

name: Bidoof
description: A comparison revealed that Bidoof's front teeth grow at the same rate as Rattata's.

name: Bibarel
description: A river dammed by Bibarel will never overflow its banks, which is appreciated by people nearby.

name: Kricketot
description: Its legs are short. Whenever it stumbles, its stiff antennae clack with a xylophone-like sound.

name: Kricketune
description: There is a village that hosts a contest based on the amazingly variable cries of this Pokémon.

name: Shinx
description: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.

name: Luxio
description: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.

name: Luxray
description: It can see clearly through walls to track down its prey and seek its lost young.

name: Budew
description: Sensitive to changing temperature, the bud is said to bloom when it feels the sun's warm touch.

name: Roserade
description: Each of its hands contains different toxins, but both hands can jab with near-fatal power.

name: Cranidos
description: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, it would snap obstructing trees with head butts.

name: Rampardos
description: If two were to smash their heads together, their foot-thick skulls would keep them from fainting.

name: Shieldon
description: It is outstandingly armored. As a result, it can eat grass and berries without having to fight.

name: Bastiodon
description: When they lined up side by side, no foe could break through. They shielded their young in that way.

name: Burmy
description: Even if it is born where there are no cocooning materials, it somehow always ends up with a cloak.

name: Wormadam
description: When evolving, its body takes in surrounding materials. As a result, there are many body variations.

name: Mothim
description: While it loves floral honey, it won't gather any itself. Instead, it plots to steal some from Combee.

name: Combee
description: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.

name: Vespiquen
description: It releases various pheromones to make the grubs in its body do its bidding while fighting foes.

name: Pachirisu
description: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.

name: Buizel
description: It spins its two tails like a screw to propel itself through water. The tails also slice clinging seaweed.

name: Floatzel
description: It is a common sight around fishing ports. It is known to rescue people and carry off prey.

name: Cherubi
description: The small ball is not only filled with nutrients, it is also tasty. Starly try to peck it off.

name: Cherrim
description: If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded petals to absorb the sun's rays with its whole body.

name: Shellos
description: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.

name: Gastrodon
description: Long ago, its entire back was shielded with a sturdy shell. There are traces of it left in its cells.

name: Ambipom
description: Split into two, the tails are so adept at handling and doing things, Ambipom rarely uses its hands.

name: Drifloon
description: Because of the way it floats aimlessly, an old folktale calls it a “Signpost for Wandering Spirits."

name: Drifblim
description: At dusk, swarms of them are carried aloft on winds. When noticed, they suddenly vanish.

name: Buneary
description: Its ears are always rolled up. They can be forcefully extended to shatter even a large boulder.

name: Lopunny
description: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.

name: Mismagius
description: Its cry sounds like an incantation. It is said the cry may rarely be imbued with happiness-giving power.

name: Honchkrow
description: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called “Summoner of Night."

name: Glameow
description: It hides its spiteful tendency of hooking its claws into the nose of its Trainer if it isn't fed.

name: Purugly
description: It binds its body with its tails to make itself look bigger. If it locks eyes, it will glare ceaselessly.

name: Chingling
description: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.

name: Stunky
description: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.

name: Skuntank
description: It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly fluid from the tip of its tail. Attacks from above confound it.

name: Bronzor
description: There are researchers who believe this Pokémon reflected like a mirror in the distant past.

name: Bronzong
description: It brought rains by opening portals to another world. It was revered as a bringer of plentiful harvests.

name: Bonsly
description: It prefers an arid atmosphere. It leaks water that looks like tears when adjusting its moisture level.

name: Mime Jr.
description: It mimics the expressions and motions of those it sees to understand the feelings of others.

name: Happiny
description: It likes to carry around a small rock. It may wander around others' feet and cause them to stumble.

name: Chatot
description: Its tongue is just like a human's. As a result, it can cleverly mimic human speech.

name: Spiritomb
description: Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.

name: Gible
description: It attacks using its huge mouth. While its attacks are powerful, it hurts itself out of clumsiness, too.

name: Gabite
description: It loves sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.

name: Garchomp
description: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.

name: Munchlax
description: In its desperation to gulp down food, it forgets about the food it has hidden under its fur.

name: Riolu
description: It has the peculiar power of being able to see emotions such as joy and rage in the form of waves.

name: Lucario
description: A well-trained one can sense auras to identify and take in the feelings of creatures over half a mile away.

name: Hippopotas
description: It shuts its nostrils tight then travels through sand as if walking. They form colonies of around ten.

name: Hippowdon
description: It is surprisingly quick to anger. It holds its mouth agape as a display of its strength.

name: Skorupi
description: As soon as the tail claws close, its needle tips secrete poison. It can survive a year without food.

name: Drapion
description: Possessing a sturdy build, it takes pride in its strength, taking down foes without using toxins.

name: Croagunk
description: It rarely fights fairly, but that is strictly to ensure survival. It is popular as a mascot.

name: Toxicroak
description: It has a poison sac at its throat. When it croaks, the stored poison is churned for greater potency.

name: Carnivine
description: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet- smelling drool and gulps them down.

name: Finneon
description: The line running down its side can store sunlight. It shines vividly at night.

name: Lumineon
description: It crawls along the seafloor using its long front fins like legs. It competes for food with Lanturn.

name: Mantyke
description: People organize tours to see this Pokémon frolic and skim the tops of waves with Remoraid.

name: Snover
description: Seemingly curious about people, they gather around footsteps they find on snowy mountains.

name: Abomasnow
description: They appear when the snow flowers bloom. When the petals fall, they retreat to places unknown again.

name: Weavile
description: Evolution made it even more devious. It communicates by clawing signs in boulders.

name: Magnezone
description: A group tried to use scientific means to make Magnezone evolve, but their efforts ended in failure.

name: Lickilicky
description: The long tongue is always soggy with slobber. The saliva contains a solvent that causes numbness.

name: Rhyperior
description: It can launch a rock held in its hand like a missile by tightening then expanding muscles instantly.

name: Tangrowth
description: Its arms are made of plants that bind themselves to things. They grow back right away if cut.

name: Electivire
description: Heedless of enemy attacks, it closes in, shoves its tails onto the foe, then looses high voltage.

name: Magmortar
description: When launching 3,600 degrees F fireballs, its body takes on a whitish hue from the intense heat.

name: Togekiss
description: It shares many blessings with people who respect one another's rights and avoid needless strife.

name: Yanmega
description: Its jaw power is incredible. It is adept at biting apart foes while flying by at high speed.

name: Leafeon
description: It basically does not fight. With cells similar to those of plants, it can perform photosynthesis.

name: Glaceon
description: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.

name: Gliscor
description: If it succeeds in catching even a faint breeze properly, it can circle the globe without flapping once.

name: Mamoswine
description: A frozen one was dug up from soil dating back 10,000 years. It woke up to much amazement.

name: Porygon-Z
description: Its programming was modified to enable work in alien dimensions. It did not work as planned.

name: Gallade
description: When trying to protect someone, it extends its elbows as if they were swords and fights savagely.

name: Probopass
description: It freely controls three small units called Mini-Noses using magnetic force.

name: Dusknoir
description: It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and guide them home.

name: Froslass
description: It freezes prey by blowing its -58 degrees F breath. It is said to then secretly display its prey.

name: Rotom
description: Its electric-like body can enter some kinds of machines and take control in order to make mischief.

name: Uxie
description: When Uxie flew, people gained the ability to solve problems. It was the birth of knowledge.

name: Mesprit
description: When Mesprit flew, people learned the joy and sadness of living. It was the birth of emotions.

name: Azelf
description: When Azelf flew, people gained the determination to do things. It was the birth of willpower.

name: Dialga
description: A legendary Pokémon of Sinnoh. It is said that time flows when Dialga's heart beats.

name: Palkia
description: A legendary Pokémon of Sinnoh. It is said that space becomes more stable with Palkia's every breath.

name: Heatran
description: Its body is made of rugged steel. However, it is partially melted in spots because of its own heat.

name: Regigigas
description: It is said to have made Pokémon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.

name: Giratina
description: It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.

name: Cresselia
description: On nights around the quarter moon, the aurora from its tail extends and undulates beautifully.

name: Phione
description: It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.

name: Manaphy
description: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokémon.

name: Darkrai
description: To protect itself, it afflicts those around it with nightmares. However, it means no harm.

name: Shaymin
description: The flowers all over its body burst into bloom if it is lovingly hugged and senses gratitude.

name: Arceus
description: It is said to have emerged from an egg in a place where there was nothing, then shaped the world.

name: Victini
description: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.

name: Snivy
description: It is very intelligent and calm. Being exposed to lots of sunlight makes its movements swifter.

name: Servine
description: It moves along the ground as if sliding. Its swift movements befuddle its foes, and it then attacks with a vine whip.

name: Serperior
description: It can stop its opponents' movements with just a glare. It takes in solar energy and boosts it internally.

name: Tepig
description: It can deftly dodge its foe's attacks while shooting fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it eats them.

name: Pignite
description: When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.

name: Emboar
description: It can throw a fire punch by setting its fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares deeply about its friends.

name: Oshawott
description: It fights using the scalchop on its stomach. In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately by slashing.

name: Dewott
description: Strict training is how it learns its flowing double-scalchop technique.

name: Samurott
description: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.

name: Patrat
description: Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days. They use their tails to communicate with others.

name: Watchog
description: When they see an enemy, their tails stand high, and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their cheek pouches.

name: Lillipup
description: It faces strong opponents with great courage. But, when at a disadvantage in a fight, this intelligent Pokémon flees.

name: Herdier
description: It has black, cape-like fur that is very hard and decreases the amount of damage it receives.

name: Stoutland
description: It rescues people stranded by blizzards in the mountains. Its shaggy fur shields it from the cold.

name: Purrloin
description: They steal from people for fun, but their victims can't help but forgive them. Their deceptively cute act is perfect.

name: Liepard
description: These Pokémon vanish and appear unexpectedly. Many Trainers are drawn to their beautiful form and fur.

name: Pansage
description: This Pokémon dwells deep in the forest. Eating a leaf from its head whisks weariness away as if by magic.

name: Simisage
description: Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.

name: Pansear
description: When it is angered, the temperature of its head tuft reaches 600° F. It uses its tuft to roast berries.

name: Simisear
description: It loves sweets because they become energy for the fire burning inside its body.

name: Panpour
description: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.

name: Simipour
description: The tuft on its head holds water. When the level runs low, it replenishes the tuft by siphoning up water with its tail.

name: Munna
description: Munna always float in the air. People whose dreams are eaten by them forget what the dreams had been about.

name: Musharna
description: The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed with the dreams of people and Pokémon.

name: Pidove
description: Each follows its Trainer's orders as best it can, but they sometimes fail to understand complicated commands.

name: Tranquill
description: It can return to its Trainer's location regardless of the distance separating them.

name: Unfezant
description: Males swing their head plumage to threaten opponents. The females' flying abilities surpass those of the males.

name: Blitzle
description: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use their flashing manes to communicate with one another.

name: Zebstrika
description: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.

name: Roggenrola
description: Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel.

name: Boldore
description: When it overflows with power, the orange crystal on its body glows. It looks for underground water in caves.

name: Gigalith
description: Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.

name: Woobat
description: Its habitat is dark forests and caves. It emits ultrasonic waves from its nose to learn about its surroundings.

name: Swoobat
description: It emits sound waves of various frequencies from its nose, including some powerful enough to destroy rocks.

name: Drilbur
description: It can dig through the ground at a speed of 30 mph. It could give a car running aboveground a good race.

name: Excadrill
description: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.

name: Audino
description: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.

name: Timburr
description: It fights by swinging a piece of lumber around. It is close to evolving when it can handle the lumber without difficulty.

name: Gurdurr
description: This Pokémon is so muscular and strongly built that even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.

name: Conkeldurr
description: It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.

name: Tympole
description: They warn others of danger by vibrating their cheeks to create a high-pitched sound.

name: Palpitoad
description: When they vibrate the bumps on their heads, they can make waves in water or earthquake-like vibrations on land.

name: Seismitoad
description: They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps. They use vibration to hurt their opponents.

name: Throh
description: When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild Throh use vines to weave their own belts.

name: Sawk
description: The sound of Sawk punching boulders and trees can be heard all the way from the mountains where they train.

name: Sewaddle
description: Leavanny dress it in clothes they made for it when it hatched. It hides its head in its hood while it is sleeping.

name: Swadloon
description: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.

name: Leavanny
description: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves, using the cutters on its arms and sticky silk.

name: Venipede
description: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try to prey on it.

name: Whirlipede
description: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.

name: Scolipede
description: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.

name: Cottonee
description: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.

name: Whimsicott
description: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.

name: Petilil
description: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.

name: Lilligant
description: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.

name: Basculin
description: Red and blue Basculin get along so poorly, they'll start fighting instantly. These Pokémon are very hostile.

name: Sandile
description: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.

name: Krokorok
description: They live in groups of a few individuals. Protective membranes shield their eyes from sandstorms.

name: Krookodile
description: They never allow prey to escape. Their jaws are so powerful, they can crush the body of an automobile.

name: Darumaka
description: When its internal fire is burning, it cannot calm down and it runs around. When the fire diminishes, it falls asleep.

name: Darmanitan
description: Its internal fire burns at 2,500° F, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.

name: Maractus
description: It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away the bird Pokémon that prey on its flower seeds.

name: Dwebble
description: This Pokémon can easily melt holes in hard rocks with a liquid secreted from its mouth.

name: Crustle
description: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle.

name: Scraggy
description: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck.

name: Scrafty
description: Groups of them beat up anything that enters their territory. Each can spit acidic liquid from its mouth.

name: Sigilyph
description: They never vary the route they fly, because their memories of guarding an ancient city remain steadfast.

name: Yamask
description: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.

name: Cofagrigus
description: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.

name: Tirtouga
description: Restored from a fossil, this Pokémon can dive to depths beyond half a mile.

name: Carracosta
description: They can live both in the ocean and on land. A slap from one of them is enough to open a hole in the bottom of a tanker.

name: Archen
description: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon, they were unable to fly and moved about by hopping from one branch to another.

name: Archeops
description: They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. From the ground, they use a running start to take flight.

name: Trubbish
description: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.

name: Garbodor
description: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.

name: Zorua
description: It changes into the forms of others to surprise them. Apparently, it often transforms into a silent child.

name: Zoroark
description: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.

name: Minccino
description: They greet one another by rubbing each other with their tails, which are always kept well groomed and clean.

name: Ciccino
description: Their white fur is coated in a special oil that makes it easy for them to deflect attacks.

name: Gothita
description: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.

name: Gothorita
description: They use hypnosis to control people and Pokémon. Tales of Gothorita leading people astray are told in every corner.

name: Gothitelle
description: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.

name: Solosis
description: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.

name: Duosion
description: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.

name: Reuniclus
description: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.

name: Ducklett
description: These bird Pokémon are excellent divers. They swim around in the water eating their favorite food--peat moss.

name: Swanna
description: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.

name: Vanillite
description: The temperature of their breath is -58° F. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.

name: Vanillish
description: Snowy mountains are this Pokémon's habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.

name: Vanilluxe
description: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and attack their foes with violent blizzards.

name: Deerling
description: The color and scent of their fur changes to match the mountain grass. When they sense hostility, they hide in the grass.

name: Sawsbuck
description: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck's horns.

name: Emolga
description: The energy made in its cheeks' electric pouches is stored inside its membrane and released while it is gliding.

name: Karrablast
description: These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet.

name: Escavalier
description: They fly around at high speed, striking with their pointed spears. Even when in trouble, they face opponents bravely.

name: Foongus
description: It lures people in with its Poké Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a Poké Ball is unknown.

name: Amoonguss
description: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls, in a swaying motion.

name: Frillish
description: With its thin, veil-like arms wrapped around the body of its opponent, it sinks to the ocean floor.

name: Jellicent
description: The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicent's habitat: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.

name: Alomomola
description: The special membrane enveloping Alomomola has the ability to heal wounds.

name: Joltik
description: Joltik that live in cities have learned a technique for sucking electricity from the outlets in houses.

name: Galvantula
description: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.

name: Ferroseed
description: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.

name: Ferrothorn
description: It fights by swinging around its three spiky feelers. A hit from these steel spikes can reduce a boulder to rubble.

name: Klink
description: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.

name: Klang
description: By changing the direction in which it rotates, it communicates its feelings to others. When angry, it rotates faster.

name: Klinklang
description: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.

name: Tynamo
description: While one alone doesn't have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.

name: Eelektrik
description: They coil around foes and shock them with electricity-generating organs that seem simply to be circular patterns.

name: Eelektross
description: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.

name: Elgyem
description: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent's brain, causing unendurable headaches.

name: Beheeyem
description: It can manipulate an opponent's memory. Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three different-colored fingers.

name: Litwick
description: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.

name: Lampent
description: This ominous Pokémon is feared. Through cities it wanders, searching for the spirits of the fallen.

name: Chandelure
description: It absorbs a spirit, which it then burns. By waving the flames on its arms, it puts its foes into a hypnotic trance.

name: Axew
description: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.

name: Fraxure
description: Since a broken tusk will not grow back, they diligently sharpen their tusks on river rocks after they've been fighting.

name: Haxorus
description: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.

name: Cubchoo
description: When it is not feeling well, its mucus gets watery and the power of its Ice-type moves decreases.

name: Beartic
description: It can make its breath freeze at will. Very able in the water, it swims around in northern seas and catches prey.

name: Cryogonal
description: When its body temperature goes up, it turns into steam and vanishes. When its temperature lowers, it returns to ice.

name: Shelmet
description: When attacked, it defends itself by closing the lid of its shell. It can spit a sticky, poisonous liquid.

name: Accelgor
description: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of thin membrane.

name: Stunfisk
description: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.

name: Mienfoo
description: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.

name: Mienshao
description: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.

name: Druddigon
description: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.

name: Golett
description: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.

name: Golurk
description: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.

name: Pawniard
description: Blades comprise this Pokémon's entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.

name: Bisharp
description: It leads a group of Pawniard. It battles to become the boss, but will be driven from the group if it loses.

name: Bouffalant
description: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.

name: Rufflet
description: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.

name: Braviary
description: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.

name: Vullaby
description: Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time approaches for it to evolve, it discards the bones it was wearing.

name: Mandibuzz
description: It makes a nest out of bones it finds. It grabs weakened prey in its talons and hauls it to its nest of bones.

name: Heatmor
description: It breathes through a hole in its tail while it burns with an internal fire. Durant is its prey.

name: Durant
description: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.

name: Deino
description: It tends to bite everything, and it is not a picky eater. Approaching it carelessly is dangerous.

name: Zweilous
description: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.

name: Hydreigon
description: This brutal Pokémon travels the skies on its six wings. Anything that moves seems like a foe to it, triggering its attack.

name: Larvesta
description: This Pokémon was believed to have been born from the sun. When it evolves, its entire body is engulfed in flames.

name: Volcarona
description: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.

name: Cobalion
description: This legendary Pokémon battled against humans to protect Pokémon. Its personality is calm and composed.

name: Terrakion
description: This Pokémon came to the defense of Pokémon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.

name: Virizion
description: This Pokémon fought humans in order to protect its friends. Legends about it continue to be passed down.

name: Tornadus
description: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.

name: Thundurus
description: Countless charred remains mar the landscape of places through which Thundurus has passed.

name: Reshiram
description: This Pokémon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it.

name: Zekrom
description: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.

name: Landorus
description: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as “The Guardian of the Fields."

name: Kyurem
description: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.

name: Keldeo
description: By blasting water from its hooves, it can glide across water. It excels at using leg moves while battling.

name: Meloetta
description: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.

name: Genesect
description: Over 300 million years ago, it was feared as the strongest of hunters. It has been modified by Team Plasma.
